title: Magnificent 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Lakeview, Available: 8/1/2022
posting_body: Brilliant two bedroom, one bathroom in Lakeview features updated kitchen with granite countertops, dishwasher, microwave, spacious living area, large bedrooms, great closet space, hardwood floors, rehabbed bathroom, central heat and air, in-unit laundry, and pets welcome!
Please Call Aleksandra Chadiev at 224/322-5494‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 30956.
